title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not take effect.
OB: The display property of the item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, but the item is still visible in the output.
EB: The display property of the item should be respected in the new PDF emitter, causing the item to be hidden when set to 'none'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'.
4. Verify that the label is still visible in the PDF output.
